text: Interesting. I don't know if the cookie thing you describe is happening here, but it's worth checking out. Thank you for the details! I was kind of afraid it might be a "it went away on its own after a while" kind of thing.
Given that I didn't bring any changes, nor did HS, one might argue that it was actually a "it went away on its own after a while" kind of error in the end :sweat_smile:
Yeah that's kind of what I meant, I realize I worded that ambiguously :sweat_smile:
Let me know if you can resolve the issue, now I'm curious what might be the cause to this elusive bug
It's in HubSpot support's hands now. Not optimistic, but we'll see.
